description.p: Extract the month number from a date or datetime value.
Returns the month number from a date or datetime value.

discussion.p: The Month function extracts the month number from a date or datetime value.

example.caption: Month() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, Month(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:48:35 00 pm|10
